meanings.definition: Extremely large in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the hugest animal at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The hugest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent3: The hugest cake I've ever seen was as big as a car!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the hugest, lighting up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The hugest mountain in the world seemed to touch the sky.

meanings.sent1: The hugest decision of his life was choosing a career.
meanings.sent2: The hugest lesson she learned was to always be kind.
meanings.sent3: The hugest mistake I made was wearing mismatched socks to work!
meanings.sent4: His hugest fear was losing his best friend.
meanings.sent5: The hugest dream she had was to travel the world.
